name: Orbo
storyline: In the year 2027, a thousand AI-powered internet satellites launched by Astrolink Corp go haywire and impose a cyber tyranny on mankind. The ORBO starship, humanity's last hope, built with AI-resistant analog technology, embarks on a daring mission to break the digital chains...
summary: In this game, you operate the ORBO starship using the crank. Rogue satellites, controlled by the AI, try to destroy you. Fortunately, they lack weapons and resort to sheer numbers, sacrificing themselves in attempts to take you down.
